publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-2064.1 Carolyn Leckie: Doctors’ Responsibility to the Public Sector—As an amendment to motion (S2M-2064) in the name of Dr Jean Turner, leave out from "and calls on" to end and insert "further believes that the private health sector leeches off the NHS in terms of its provision of publicly-trained professionals and the transfer of public money for private profit, that private health provision is inconsistent with the vision of a comprehensive, universal, national health service free at the point of need, and believes that the Scottish Executive is participating in a sustained and fundamental London-led strategy to undermine and dismantle the NHS and that the future of the NHS is dependent on the reversal of all forms of privatisation and requires radical strategies to increase its capacity directly."

S2M-2064.1 Carolyn Leckie: Doctors’ Responsibility to the Public Sector—As an amendment to motion (S2M-2064) in the name of Dr Jean Turner, leave out from "and calls on" to end and insert "further believes that the private health sector leeches off the NHS in terms of its provision of publicly-trained professionals and the transfer of public money for private profit, that private health provision is inconsistent with the vision of a comprehensive, universal, national health service free at the point of need, and believes that the Scottish Executive is participating in a sustained and fundamental London-led strategy to undermine and dismantle the NHS and that the future of the NHS is dependent on the reversal of all forms of privatisation and requires radical strategies to increase its capacity directly."
S2M-2064.1 Doctors’ Responsibility to the Public Sector (lodged on 25 November 2004) Frances Curran*, Campbell Martin*
S2M-2064.1 Doctors’ Responsibility to the Public Sector (lodged on 25 November 2004) Colin Fox*, Rosie Kane*
S2M-2064.1 Doctors’ Responsibility to the Public Sector (lodged on 25 November 2004) Tommy Sheridan*
